name: SpaceWar (itch) (DevBroHere)
description:
SpaceWar is a game of controlling a spaceship and avoiding a black hole. Your task is to simply destroy the other player. Warning: 2 people needed to play.

Controls:

Player 1: w - acceleration, a;d - rotation, space - shooting

Player2: up - acceleration, left;right - rotation, right ctrl - shooting

Have fun!
